titles.title: To modify and extend the temporary reduction of duty on mixtures of imidacloprid with application adjuvants.
To modify and extend the temporary reduction of duty on mixtures of imidacloprid with application adjuvants.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to temporaily reduce the duty on mixtures of imidacloprid with application adjuvants.
